application.doc: Retrieve all audit components for a type

param.name: type_id
param.doc: The type of the audit component group. Valid values are runtime or management.

method.name: GET
method.id: Retrieve all audit component for a type
method.doc: To retrieve all audit components for a given type, issue an HTTP GET command on the audit component resource URI.

param.name: Accept:application/json
param.doc: Required for requests to the service.

representation.name: componentsJsonResponse
representation.doc: Note: Response body is an array.

param.name: group
param.doc: The name of the audit component group.

param.name: id
param.doc: The unique identifier of the audit component group.

param.name: type
param.doc: The type of the audit component group. Valid values are runtime or management.

param.name: enabled
param.doc: A flag indicating whether or not auditing for this audit component group is enabled.
